name: RoyaleBlock
description:
VERSION 0.0.5: Super Sniper,Meat And Sheep

How to play multiplayer:Press "Create Game" and choose to be LAN or Online

Online means that everyone can see the server on the server browser  (it will show if there are a lot of servers)

Lan means joinable with IP (for playing with friends if you have any lol)

News:https://www.instagram.com/royaleblock_official/
